home.title: What is ezUnpaywall?
home.intro: The ezUnpaywall server is an unpaywall mirror hosted at Inist-CNRS and developed by ezTEAM.

contact.subject: Subject
contact.emailSent: Your contact request has just been sent to the team.
contact.emailMustBeValid: The email address must be valid

enrich.explainationLogs: Files you want to be enriched by ezUnpaywall. The only condition is that they contain a DOI field.
enrich.explainationTestsLogs: Need files to test this service? We provide some on GitHub.

general.data_standard: Data collection approaches used for this resource
general.is_oa: Is there an OA copy of this resource
general.is_paratext: Is the item an ancillary part of a journal, like a table of contents
general.journal_is_in_doaj: Is this resource published in a DOAJ-indexed journal
general.journal_is_oa: Is this resource published in a completely OA journal
general.journal_issn_l: A single ISSN for the journal publishing this resource
general.journal_issns: Any ISSNs assigned to the journal publishing this resource
general.journal_name: Name of the journal publishing this resource
general.oa_status: OA status, or color, of this resource
general.title: Title of this resource
general.updated: Time when the data for this resource was last updated

oa_location.evidence: How unpaywall found this OA location
oa_location.host_type: Type of host that serves this OA location
oa_location.is_best: Is this location the best_oa_location for its resource
oa_location.license: License under which this copy is published
oa_location.pmh_id: OAI-PMH endpoint where we found this location
oa_location.updated: Time when the data for this location was last updated
oa_location.url: The url_for_pdf if there is one; otherwise landing page URL
oa_location.url_for_landing_page: URL for a landing page describing this OA copy
oa_location.url_for_pdf: URL with a PDF version of this OA copy
oa_location.version: Content version accessible at this location

z_authors.authenticated-orcid: If true, record owner asserts that the ORCID user completed ORCID OAuth authentication

status.noInUpdate: The data is up to date

header.help: The unpaywall mirror data is updated daily at 12:30 p.m.
